snippet: American officials said new “counterprovocation” plans called for a response that would hit the source of any attack by North Korea with similar weapons.
abstract: United States and South Korea draw up plans to respond more forcefully to North Korea than in recent past amid rising military tensions; American officials say new 'counter-provocation' plan calls for immediate but proportional response that would hit source of any attack by North Korea with similar weapons.

byline.original: By DAVID E. SANGER and THOM SHANKER

lead_paragraph: American officials said new “counterprovocation” plans called for a response that would hit the source of any attack by North Korea with similar weapons.

headline.seo: U.S. and South Korea Devise Plan to Counter North
headline.main: U.S. Designs a Korea Response Proportional to the Provocation
headline.print_headline: U.S. Designs a Korea Response Proportional to the Provocation

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
